nodes.text: Ellé was a Human female from Naboo who served as one of Senator Padmé Amidala's handmaidens at the end of the Clone Wars.
In 19 BBY, Ellé served with her fellow handmaiden, Moteé. She was one of the select few who knew of Amidala's secret marriage to the Jedi Anakin Skywalker.
Ellé was portrayed by Australian actress Chantal Freer in a deleted scene of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.
